job_title: Assistant Director of Enrollment in Cleveland, OH
pros: Ursuline is an institution of higher education that dedicates itself to its students, and it really shows how important students are to its mission.
cons: Ursuline does not extend that same importance to its staff and faculty.

pros: Women's focused College and workplace. Fantastic Leadership. Great work life balance
cons: fiscally conservative. Salaries could be higher but the culture is s fantastic that it outweighs the negative

pros: Close knit, beautiful campus, peer colleagues excellent

review_title: Ursuline is positive and negative in different ways
pros: small, tight-knit community; you really get to know other staff members and they get to know you.  everyone (staff, faculty, and students) are very nice
cons: they can't afford to pay as much as you might receive in the same job elsewhere.  strong push towards tradition and resistance to change.  there is a big divide between administrative staff and faculty.  it can kind of get "clique-y"

review_title: Little Advancement or acknowlegement of hard work
job_title: Enrollment Specialist/Admission Assistant in Pepper Pike, OH
pros: Among co-workers it is a fun working environment.  If you like to help and talk with prospective college students it's great to work at.
cons: Huge turnovers, under market value of salary.  Don't expect too much growth career-wise or advancement unless you do a lateral move to another department.

pros: Excellent student outcomes for any incoming or returning students.
cons: It is a little far away from the rest of Cleveland, OH.
